dbtechno.com/2015/05/blue-moon-lawsuit-i.snippet: Blue Moon lawsuit: Is Blue Moon Really A Craft Beer? A California craft beer drinker has filed a class action lawsuit against MillerCoors, claiming that Blue Moons parent company tricked him into thinking the mass-produced wheat ale is a craft beer.
